SRP.A: Starfall Championship is {above} Nova Games in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total stadium attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crimson Clash}.

VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Nova Games}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Stadium Attendance go below 224414.28 tickets/session? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Stadium Attendance in 2004 higher or lower than in 2010?
NC.A: The total stadium attendance in 2004 was {higher} than in 2010.

NC.Q: Between 2003 and 2005, was the average total Stadium Attendance higher or lower than between 2006 and 2010?

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2008, did the total Stadium Attendance experience a larger or smaller change than between 2008 and 2009?

MSR.A: {Crimson Clash} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Nova Games, Aether Cup Finals, Echo Bowl, Starfall Championship, Crimson Clash}.
